name: Co-operation Ireland
legal: Registered Charity in NI and ROI
goal: Co-operation Ireland is a peacebuilding charity working across the island of Ireland and between Britain and Ireland. Its mission is building mutual respect and understanding for mutual benefit. The organisation was founded in 1979 and has offices in Belfast and Dublin.
euInitiatives: Acted as a lead partner in a number SEUPB funded programmes on promoting reconciliation in NI Ireland and 6 Border counties with ROI. These projects are funded under the Peace IV programme and are solely related to peacebuilding
